languages.text: "Причина того, что мы стоим здесь — лживые обвинения и не более того".

traits.locale_text: "Причина того, что мы стоим здесь — лживые обвинения и не более того".

languages.text: "Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."
languages.original_text: "Причина того, что мы стоим здесь — лживые обвинения и не более того".

traits.locale_text: "The reason we are standing here today are the false accusations and nothing more."
"The reason we are standing here today are the false accusations and nothing more."
"The reason we are standing here today are the false accusations and nothing more."
"The reason we are standing here today are the false accusations and nothing more."
"Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."
"Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."

languages.text: 「我々が今日ここにいるのは、捏造された罪状によるものだ。それ以上のものはなにもない」
languages.original_text: "Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."

traits.locale_text: 「我々が今日ここにいるのは、捏造された罪状によるものだ。それ以上のものはなにもない」

languages.text: “今天我们之所以会站在这里，不过是因为那些人无中生有的指控罢了。”
languages.original_text: "Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."

traits.locale_text: “今天我们之所以会站在这里，不过是因为那些人无中生有的指控罢了。”

languages.text: « Si nous sommes ici aujourd'hui, c'est à cause d'accusations inventées de toutes pièces. Rien de plus. »
languages.original_text: "Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."

traits.locale_text: « Si nous sommes ici aujourd'hui, c'est à cause d'accusations inventées de toutes pièces. Rien de plus. »

languages.text: «Estamos aquí por una serie de calumnias y falsas acusaciones, nada más».
languages.original_text: "Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."

traits.locale_text: «Estamos aquí por una serie de calumnias y falsas acusaciones, nada más».

languages.text: "Falsche Behauptungen sind der einzige Grund, warum wir heute hier stehen ... mehr nicht."
languages.original_text: "Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."

traits.locale_text: "Wir stehen hier heute wegen der falschen Anschuldigungen, das ist der einzige Grund."

languages.text: "Burada bulunmamızın tek sebebi uydurma ithamlardır. Hiçbirinin temeli sağlam değildir."
languages.original_text: "Trumped-up charges are the only reason we are standing here today — nothing more."

traits.locale_text: "Burada bulunmamızın tek sebebi uydurma ithamlardır, o kadar."
